spec.name: Ain Chock mosque Park
spec.description: The Ain Chock Mosque is a local place of worship in the Aïn Chock neighborhood of Casablanca. The naming convention 'Ain Chock Mosque Park' suggests it is either situated within a park or, more likely, adjacent to a public green space, providing both a religious and communal area for the local population. Mosques like this are centers for daily prayers and community gatherings.

links.title: Waze Driving Directions for Masjid M'salla, Aïn Chock
